00036         // Google Places serach url's
00037         private static final String PLACES_SEARCH_URL = "https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place/search/json?rankby=distance&";
00038         private static final String PLACES_TEXT_SEARCH_URL = "https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place/search/json?rankby=distance&";
00039         private static final String PLACES_DETAILS_URL = "https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place/details/json?rankby=distance&extensions=review_summary&";
00040         private static final String PLACES_PHOTO = "https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place/photo?";
00041 
00042         private double _latitude;
00043         private double _longitude;
00044         private double _radius = 80;

00058         // public PlacesList search(double latitude, double longitude, double
00059         // radius, String types)
00060         public PlacesList search(double latitude, double longitude, String types)
00061                         throws Exception {
00062 
00063                 this._latitude = latitude;
00064                 this._longitude = longitude;
00065                 this._radius = 80;
00066 
00067                 try {
00068 
00069                         HttpRequestFactory httpRequestFactory = createRequestFactory(HTTP_TRANSPORT);
00070                         HttpRequest request = httpRequestFactory
00071                                         .buildGetRequest(new GenericUrl(PLACES_SEARCH_URL));
00072                         request.getUrl().put("key", API_KEY);
00073                         request.getUrl().put("location", _latitude + "," + _longitude);
00074                         request.getUrl().put("sensor", "false");
00075                         if (types != null)
00076                                 request.getUrl().put("types", types);
00077 
00078                         PlacesList list = request.execute().parseAs(PlacesList.class);
00079                         // Check log cat for places response status
00080                         Log.d("Places Status", "" + list.status);
00081                         return list;
00082 
00083                 } catch (HttpResponseException e) {
00084                         Log.e("Error:", e.getMessage());
00085                         return null;
00086                 }
00087 
00088         }
00089 
00097         public PlaceDetails getPlaceDetails(String reference) throws Exception {
00098                 try {
00099 
00100                         HttpRequestFactory httpRequestFactory = createRequestFactory(HTTP_TRANSPORT);
00101                         HttpRequest request = httpRequestFactory
00102                                         .buildGetRequest(new GenericUrl(PLACES_DETAILS_URL));
00103                         request.getUrl().put("key", API_KEY);
00104                         request.getUrl().put("reference", reference);
00105                         request.getUrl().put("sensor", "false");
00106 
00107                         PlaceDetails place = request.execute().parseAs(PlaceDetails.class);
00108 
00109                         return place;
00110 
00111                 } catch (HttpResponseException e) {
00112                         Log.e("Error in Perform Details", e.getMessage());
00113                         throw e;
00114                 }
00115         }
00116 
00117         public PlaceDetails getPlacePicture(String reference) throws Exception {
00118                 try {
00119 
00120                         HttpRequestFactory httpRequestFactory = createRequestFactory(HTTP_TRANSPORT);
00121                         HttpRequest request = httpRequestFactory
00122                                         .buildGetRequest(new GenericUrl(PLACES_PHOTO));
00123                         request.getUrl().put("key", API_KEY);
00124                         request.getUrl().put("reference", reference);
00125                         request.getUrl().put("sensor", "false");
00126 
00127                         PlaceDetails place = request.execute().parseAs(PlaceDetails.class);
00128 
00129                         return place;
00130 
00131                 } catch (HttpResponseException e) {
00132                         Log.e("Error in Perform Details", e.getMessage());
00133                         throw e;
00134                 }
00135         }

00140         public static HttpRequestFactory createRequestFactory(
00141                         final HttpTransport transport) {
00142                 return transport.createRequestFactory(new HttpRequestInitializer() {
00143                         public void initialize(HttpRequest request) {
00144                                 GoogleHeaders headers = new GoogleHeaders();
00145                                 headers.setApplicationName("Places-Test");
00146                                 request.setHeaders(headers);
00147                                 JsonHttpParser parser = new JsonHttpParser(new JacksonFactory());
00148                                 request.addParser(parser);
00149                         }
00150                 });
00151         }
